Let us welcome you to Zimbabwe!
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
We’ve proudly launched a new African destination for you to discover, Zimbabwe! We traveled far and wide – from the expansive Lake Kariba, to the iconic Hwange National Park, to the truly wild Mana Pools – in order to bring you the best advice, experiences and African memories.
Find everything you need to know about this awe-inspiring destination here.
Below you’ll also find a feature from our Australian based travel expert Karen Peasley wrote about her great Zim journey, a wanderlust inducing travel special, our brand new video and much more!
~ Marcus Brain, Safari365 founder ~
